body.p: Parent allocates the impairment loss to the parts of the cash‑generating unit on the basis of the relative carrying values of the goodwill of the parts before the impairment. In this example Subsidiary is allocated 36 per cent of the impairment (450/1,250). The impairment loss is then allocated to the controlling and non‑controlling interests on the same basis as that on which profit or loss is allocated.
